page.title: 17Some thoughts from grown-ups
page.content: We talked to a lot of grown-up people and most of them said the same thing. UNEMPLOYMENT The people we spoke to were all upset because there are so many people in the country who can not get any work.The worst places are the big cities but all over the country there is unemployment.The sad thing is that many of the people are those who have just left school and unlike years ago it does not apply to only those with little or no qualification. Most people thought that the situation would not get any better in the future and nobody we talked to said that other parties would do any better or worse. It was strange that in our area we could only find 4 or 5 people out of work or maybe 2% of the population.
